Experience

Full Stack Web Developer & System Analyst/Designer

Cnawlece Inc.

Leveraged an agile system design strategy using a proprietary web technologies in order to produce custom web software to a number of non-profit equestrian organizations across Canada. My main responsibilities included meeting virtually with clients regularly to gather the business use-cases/system requirements so that I could design, implement and deploy information systems to help manage and grow their business. Additionally, I provided immediate front-line to support to clients when needed and performed managerial tasks such as allocating work to my co-workers, ensuring that business targets are met and providing quality assurance.

August 2016 - Present

WordPress & JavaScript Developer

Design2Web

Utilized popular WordPress plugins such as Visual Composer to create and maintain static WordPress websites. Additionally, using MEAN stack technologies, I developed an internal business tool that was used for sales and lead generation by Design2Web. This tool allowed the company to browse the Amazon Product database as well as provided the ability to select any number of Amazon products to have their statistics tracked in periodic intervals. After a reasonable amount of data has been collected on any one product, Design2Web was able to determine which Amazon products were increasing/decreasing in sellers rank so that their sales could make better decisions on lead generation.

June 2016 - October 2016

My main focus was on writing front-end JavaScript code (specifically, angular.js), as well as designed and implemented simple user interaces. Successfully utilized modern web technologies and development operation tools such as Node.js, Grunt, Git, a RDMS (StrongLoop), MVC, etc.

October 2015 - May 2016

Convergys
